skills.name: Fireball
skills.description: Magic ball infused with fire magic, it explodes when hit something

skills.name: Waterball
skills.description: When explodes damages targets in forward cone shape with a splash of water

skills.name: Windball
skills.description: Wind infused magic ball that follows a target

skills.name: Lightningball
skills.description: When it moves through the air, it emmits ark lightnings that damage random enemis

skills.name: Earthball
skills.description: After hitting an object it creates a stone pilar

skills.name: Darkball
skills.description: Enemies in close proximity to the ball run in fear and receive damage

skills.name: Lightball
skills.description: Follows the player and heals him over time
